Analog tools: Utilize analog tools like compasses, protractors, and rulers to measure and draw geometric shapes and patterns.
Hand-drawn diagrams: Create hand-drawn diagrams or mind maps to organize thoughts and ideas.
Brainstorming sessions: Organize brainstorming sessions with friends or colleagues to bounce ideas off each other and collaborate on solutions.
Online resources: Utilize online resources such as educational websites, video tutorials, and online forums to learn new skills and complete assignments.
Physical notebooks: Use physical notebooks to take notes, jot down ideas, and sketch out concepts.
